Name: Wagon wheels (set of 4)
Description: Four wagon wheels to be used as spares - in case one gets a flat.

Name: Cheese (lb)
Description: Unnamed and near-tasteless variety of cheese; sold in blocks by the pound.

Name: Clothing set
Description: One full set of clothing. Not gender-specific.

Name: Box of 20 bullets
Description: Contains twenty (20) bullets. Can be used with any gun. Probably.

Name: Laudanum
Description: A couple sips of this and you won't even remember what ails you.

Name: Bacon (lb)
Description: Salted and cured pork. You know the drill.

Name: Tins of biscuits
Description: These particular biscuits are also known as "hardtack". You'll find out why.

Name: Molasses (16 oz jar)
Description: Because sometimes the best thing to have is a jar of viscous sugarcane byproduct.

Name: Wagon axle
Description: The thing that makes a wheel act like a wheel.

Name: Wagon tongue
Description: I think it connects the wagon to the horses or oxen? Breaks very easily.

Name: Boots (pair)
Description: It's not recommended to head out on the trail barefoot.
